author: gameranx
description:
Nintendo has officially announced the Nintendo Switch 2 with a release date, new launch games, better graphics and more.
Subscribe for more: https://www.youtube.com/gameranxTV?sub_confirmation=1

title: Nintendo Switch 2: 10 BIGGEST ANNOUNCEMENTS

author: gameranx
description:
What is Mindseye? A new IP from also new studio BUILD A ROCKET BOY (directed by former Rockstar producer Leslie Benzies) looks awesome but also raises some questions.
Subscribe for more: https://www.youtube.com/gameranxTV?sub_confirmation=1

Mindeyes is a 'proof of concept' game - https://www.gamedeveloper.com/business/io-interactive-will-publish-build-a-rocket-boy-s-proof-of-concept-game-for-everywhere-platform

community driven game space 'everywhere' - https://www.gamedeveloper.com/business/former-rockstar-north-boss-nets-110m-to-launch-what-sounds-a-lot-like-a-metaverse

Leslie Benzies leaves rockstar - https://www.gamedeveloper.com/business/longtime-rockstar-north-chief-leslie-benzies-has-left-the-company

game is going to be 'about 15 hours long' - https://gamingbolt.com/mindseye-is-about-15-hours-long-as-developer-aims-for-a-meaningful-well-crafted-story

game's assets will be made available - https://www.gamesradar.com/mindseye-is-a-new-aaa-action-adventure-game-that-lives-in
title: Could This NEW GAME Compete With GTA 6's VICE CITY?
